meanings.sent1: The timid bunny was very uncourageous when faced with the loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The soldier felt uncourageous as he hesitated to charge into battle.
meanings.sent3: The uncourageous squirrel ran away from a tiny mouse, much to the amusement of the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her uncourageous heart felt heavy like a stone, unable to face the challenges ahead.
meanings.sent5: The uncourageous kitten trembled in fear at the sight of a harmless butterfly.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of courage or bravery.
meanings.sent1: The uncourageous student avoided speaking up in class discussions.
meanings.sent2: His uncourageous behavior during the crisis disappointed his teammates.
meanings.sent3: The uncourageous puppy hid behind its owner when a small bird flew by.
meanings.sent4: The uncourageous decision to retreat led to further difficulties for the group.
meanings.sent5: Her uncourageous actions spoke louder than any words, revealing her true nature.
